text: Glendive is a city in Montana in the United States. It is the county seat of Dawson County. Almost 5,000 people lived there according to census in 2020. The Yellowstone River flows through the town. Makoshika State Park is to the east. ==Notable people== * Tim M. Babcock, 16th Governor of Montana * Adam Morrison, professional basketball player * Alfred E. Perlman, President, New York Central Railroad, President Western Pacific Railroad ==References== Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana
title: Glendive, Montana
